com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs

Class HcsDidNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.HcsDidNetwork

  • public final class HcsDidNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    Appnet's identity network based on Hedera HCS DID method specification.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • fromAddressBook

        public static HcsDidNetwork fromAddressBook(HederaNetwork network,
                                            HcsDidNetworkAddressBook addressBook)
        Instantiates existing identity network from a provided address book.
        Parameters:
        network - The Hedera network.
        addressBook - The HcsDidNetworkAddressBook of the identity network.
        Returns:
        The identity network instance.

      • fromAddressBookFile

        public static HcsDidNetwork fromAddressBookFile(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Client client,
                                                HederaNetwork network,
                                                com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.file.FileId addressBookFileId,
                                                com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Hbar maxQueryPayment)
                                         throws com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaNetworkException,
                                                com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaStatusException
        Instantiates existing identity network using an address book file read from Hedera File Service.
        Parameters:
        client - The Hedera network client.
        network - The Hedera network.
        addressBookFileId - The FileID of HcsDidNetworkAddressBook file stored on Hedera File Service.
        maxQueryPayment - Maximum HBAR payment for querying the address book file content.
        Returns:
        The identity network instance.
        Throws:
        com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaStatusException - In case querying Hedera File Service fails.
        com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaNetworkException - In case of querying Hedera File Service fails due to transport calls.

      • fromHcsDid

        public static HcsDidNetwork fromHcsDid(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Client client,
                                       HcsDid hcsDid,
                                       com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.Hbar maxQueryPayment)
                                throws com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaNetworkException,
                                       com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaStatusException
        Instantiates existing identity network using a DID generated for this network.
        Parameters:
        client - The Hedera network client.
        hcsDid - The Hedera HCS DID.
        maxQueryPayment - Maximum HBAR payment for querying the address book file content.
        Returns:
        The identity network instance.
        Throws:
        com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaStatusException - In case querying Hedera File Service fails.
        com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaNetworkException - In case of querying Hedera File Service fails due to transport calls.

      • generateDid

        public HcsDid generateDid(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.crypto.ed25519.Ed25519PublicKey publicKey,
                          boolean withTid)
        Generates a new DID from the given public DID root key.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - A DID root key.
        withTid - Indicates if DID topic ID should be added to the DID as tid parameter.
        Returns:
        A newly generated DID.

        Generated HcsDid with it's private DID root key.
